title: Justice for the Lemon Trees
description: Born with the freedom of the 70s and the independence of the 80s, a suburban middle class girl grows up to shattered dreams broken by child abuse, rape, domestic violence, mental illness, and prison. Passionately conveyed with an honest voice, Jessica Lucci describes her survival in a lifetime of words which is both laudable and horrifying. “Justice for the Lemon Trees” reveals the struggles of a woman rising up to recreate new life after trauma.
author: Jessica Lucci
